official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide technical assistance with respect to the Gerald R. Ford birthplace in the State of Nebraska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide guidance for the marking and interpreting of the Gerald R. Ford birthplace, Omaha, Nebraska.
